thumb.title: Film Star [original song, Vocaloid, Sarah]
thumb.description: The song is about identity, detachment, and disillusionment with the pursuit of fame. LyricsLook twice round the roomActing like your scene is setHomebound too soonIt's a detail that you're hereGlance while they swoonReacting as your line is cutHomebound too soonIt's a detail that you're hereSpice up your deathBreathing like your on your last dragCause the moonTry retail therapyGlance while they swoonActing like your scene is setHomebound too soonIt's no wonder that you've lost your wayYou're as cold as iceYou're a film starPure like menthol scrapedCured like lepersWayWay#synthpop #vocaloid #sarah
